content:
So good. Then, please write Chapter B below.
As before, it would be even better if you write it so that developers can easily understand it through various examples and analogies, and supplement it with simple code examples.
b. User Object Type
i. Explain the purpose of the user object type
ii. Discuss various user roles and capabilities in WordPress
iii. Describe the importance of user metadata and how it can be used to store additional information about a user
Answer in English.지금 번역하기
